name: Tale of the Guardian
description:
We are Linked Guardians. This is our first game working together.  We hope you enjoy it!

The game is still in development, but we want to share this demo with you!

Tale of the Guardian is a 3D Platformer videogame, where you become the Guardian of the Water in order to protect the world from contamination and defeat the dangerous Scrapters!
The objective of the game is to find all the Gems in the Sacred Lake Zone to restore the Power Gem energy and restore the peace in the zone.

Consider to tell us in the comment section down below what you think about the game.
All the feedback is greatly apreciated!
